replies.body: All the adcs need chromas.. They're the elegant fighting machines that carry the game with style.
Eh, I'd argue that. The adc needs the team just as much as the team needs the adc. More, if I were to be honest. Adcs that dont realise this are just so... {{champion:67}} :3
i dont beleive it cause im usually carrying the game as mid or maybe its just how good i am **sometimes** XD
They need to release a decent cass skin, the chroma pack looks alright, but she has the potential for some really amazing skins. (I'm thinking mecha cass)

I was like "No, that's just stu-Oh. My. God. That would be amazing. Rito plz. plzplzplzplz" XD
Oh my lord the {{champion:67}} Chroma..... Finally a chroma pack i can get into   :) thanks riot
